member.name: M:Task1.Population.GetYears(System.Int32,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Int32)

member.param: The population at the beginning of a year.
By so many percent the population increases every year.
Number of inhabitants at the moment.
member.returns: years does the town need to have population greater or equal to currentPopulation inhabitants.
member.exception: this params , , cannot be less or equals zero.

this params
cannot be less then 0% or more then 100%.
